title: Planet Of The Apes - iPhone formatted MP4 Movies
description:
I have decided to create a torrent with the 112 MP4 Movies formatted for iPhone/iPod/iPad that I have downloaded via various sites/apps. None of these were ripped/copied by me. This is just a collection that I thought some might have some use for it. These are medium quality files, but on the iPhone/iPod/iPad they are in really good quality. I do not have an android or other device, but I believe if it can play an MP4 file that the same quality will be high. 
I hope you enjoy these movies. 

The file [!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! README - iPhone & Android Users !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!] contains the info below, which is where the majority of these files were downloaded from. 
iPhone: Movie Box App
(**Must be jailbroken) http://movie-box.cc
Android: Show Box App
(**Must have install from enable install from Untrusted/Unknown sources turned on) <a href="
http://media-apps.cc/android/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://media-apps.cc/android/</a>

Contents of Torrent:

POTA - Planet of the Apes (1968).mp4
POTA - Battle for the Planet of the Apes (1973.mp4
POTA - Beneath the Planet of the Apes. (1970).mp4
POTA - Conquest of the Planet of the Apes - (1972).mp4
